name: Scary Neighbor Granny House 3D
description:
This is a " Scary Neighbor Granny House 3D " in Hospital and you have to explore the house of granny find next door suspicious activities in Hospital and escape safely before strange granny start shooting finally and caught you.

You play as a normal man who lives in his horror and is so good in his life.
Features:

- horror house simulation
- single player game
- on-screen controls
- haunted house realistic graphics
- scary music for extra spooky horror effect
